title: Polydimethylsiloxane based dry adhesives produced using a replica molding technique
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14807-14814
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00667D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hasan Talal M. Hassani, Willman William Dsouza, Sruthi V. Oopath, Avinash Baji
A replica molding technique is used to produce micron-sized pillars on the surface of polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS). The shear adhesion strength of the sample is determined to be 0.12 N cm−2.
